predicate.note: Frames file for 'swing' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: They do n't like the risks they are forced to assume when prices swing so drastically .

roleset.name: cause swinging motion
roleset.note: This could perhaps be merged with swing.01

example.name: stock report, natch
example.text: J.P. Morgan & Co. swung to a loss in the third quarter, while NCNB Corp. reported net income more than doubled, and Security Pacific Corp. net rose 10%.
example.arg: while NCNB Corp. reported net income more than doubled, and Security Pacific Corp. net rose 10%

example.name: swing me baby, one more time
example.text: Aided by the fluid playing of the St. Louis Symphony under Leonard Slatkin's direction, this ``Serenade'' really swings.
example.arg: Aided by the fluid playing of the St. Louis Symphony under Leonard Slatkin's direction
example.note: Technically this could be merged with swing.01, but the meaning is different enough to warrant a different roleset.
